file_content.text: Reports continue to come in regarding recent activity from the Chevin Conglomerate; the Chevin government condemned for its slaving and ties to criminal syndicates.
Recently, emissaries from the Chevin Conglomerate have approached mercenaries and scavengers across dozens of worlds. The reason? Unknown, but many speculate--
Greetings from the Chevin Conglomerate. Our eternal purpose: to provide personal enrichment opportunities. All other claims are libelous.
The Grand Acquisitions Race has begun. Profit opportunities are extensive for individuals capable of interstellar travel. Others need not apply.
Our representative on the Nar Shaddaa Promenade awaits aspiring Conglomerate agents. End transmission.
We... appear to have suffered a brief technical fault. Um... Psst, Taro, switch the feed!
